body:
Me and my friend want to do a parody of a song. Anyone want to give what song we should do and what it should be about. Or just what it should be about if you want. 
Thank you

Vlad ^_^
body_tagged:
Me and my friend want to do a parody of a song. Anyone want to give what song we should do and what it should be about. Or just what it should be about if you want.

Vlad ^_^
title: Parody Ideas

replies.body:
1 - Which friend? :P

2 - Wrecking Ball
3 - Let It Go
4 - I'm Sexy And I Know It
5 - Counting Stars
6 - Radioactive
7 - My Songs Know What You Did In The Dark
8 - Wake Me Up

I'll think of more. :P

replies.body:
Miley Cyruses record company will fuck you sh*t so hard if you make a parody ._.

But i would recommend Magic! - Rude XDXDXD
